mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply (rno, bno, reply, replyer) values (seq_reply.nextval, #{bno}, #{reply}, #{replyer})
insert into tbl_reply (rno, bno, reply, replyer, parent) values (seq_reply.nextval, #{bno}, #{reply}, #{replyer}, #{parent})
mapper.update: update tbl_reply set reply = #{reply}, deleted = #{deleted}, updatedate = sysdate where rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: select count(rno) from tbl_reply where bno=#{bno}
